[ Package Index | Mudlib Index | Effect Index ]

File /std/dom/base_master.c

Called to check for rcsforcing of a file. By default we allow the deputies to rcsforce things.

Includes

This class includes the following files /include/error_handler.h, /include/project_management.h and /include/player_handler.h

query_assigned_to_directory
string * query_assigned_to_directory(string * dir)
Finds the person assigned to the specific directory. It will climb up the directory tree looking for who to assign the directory too.

Parameters:
dir - the directory to find assignments in
Returns:
the array of people assigned to the directory
